name: Chemistry Time
description:
Chemistry Time!

You are a time traveler who has accidentally destroyed Mendeleev's work on the periodic table! If you don't get it back in order in time your home in future will no longer exist! 😲

Drag the elements into the correct slots before the year 1869!

Controls

Left click/Drag: Select/Move

Scroll wheel/Up/Down: Zoom Camera

Time taken: 3:38:47

Hints/Bug Work Arounds

If you lose an element tile, you may have picked it up with another element or a piece of paper. The elements snap to the middle of the page so if you grab the paper by the edge/corner you should normally be able to find the element tile.

Post Jam Improvements

If I were to continue development I would fix the slight issue with overlapping elements and/or paper snapping together.

I would add more sound effects and fix the game ending only when elements are released from the player's control.

More levels of time travel puzzle-y goodness!

Credits Programming and Design

Derwent Ready

Voice Talent

Teifion Powell
